remarks: Multiplication of both sides of 'less than' by a positive number. Theorem I.19 of [Apostol] p. 20.  (Contributed by NM, 16-May-1999.)
statement:
ltplus1.1 $e |- A e. RR $.
prodgt0.2 $e |- B e. RR $.
ltmul1.3 $e |- C e. RR $.
ltmul2i $p |- ( 0 < C -> ( A < B <-> ( C x. A ) < ( C x. B ) ) ) $.
